name: Travel to Peru
short_description:
Cusco
Cusco is situated at 3,400 meters (11,000 feet) above sea level, surrounded by Andean mountains and green valleys. Visit Machu Picchu, by Inca Trail or by train or with other tours that are available, and enjoy the Sacred Valley. 
Arequipa
 (travel to peru)Denominated as "white city", Arequipa is surrounded by spectacular mountains, including the volcano "El Misti". A feature of the city is its many beautiful colonial buildings made of a light-colored volcanic rock called sillar. Visit Colca Canyon... 
Puno
(trave to peru)Lake Titicaca, is undeniably an impressive sight. A National Reserve since 1978, it has over sixty varieties of birds, fourteen species of native fish and eighteen types of amphibians. Visit Urus, Taquile, Amantani
 http://www.innovatravel.com.pe/
